businessProfile.name: Frank's Pizza Restaurant
businessProfile.address: 4950 S Rainbow Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89118, USA
businessProfile.formatted_address: 4950 S Rainbow Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89118, USA

reviews.text:
I have a new favorite pizza. I've been reading reviews and been wanting to find out for myself.
Nicely decorated inside.  Kinda old school decor but very clean looking.
I ordered 2 cheese slices and got a drink too - it was 7.50 out the door, great price.
Got 2 slices right out from the oven, using the Portnoy scale, i definitely rate this 8.4 or better.  Very nice char on bottom, crispy crust.  They must be using higher quality mozzarella, no grease.  Just enough sauce, with nice flavors.  Great chew to the slices.
The owner checked with me to make sure everything was good, it was great.
I definitely will be back, will explore more of their menu.

Frank‚Äôs pizza is a hidden gem in Las Vegas! This is our second time visiting the restaurant, and they amazed us yet again!!
The veggie pizza was scrumptious, along with the cheese calzone and mozzarella sticks! Had an amazing time at this restaurant! Can‚Äôt wait to visit again next time we are here! The prices are affordable, and the service by the Frank family is lovely! They are so kind, and you can see their happiness while they are making the food! You must visit!! üòä

We ordered take out from this quaint little pizza restaurant. The Franks specialty pizza on thin crust was delicious. Their crust is not over done and buttery. Their lasagna was very favorable, sauce is the bomb with a hint of garlic. My compliments to the chef. We also ordered an antipasto salad, not quite an Italian antipasto, but also very good. Their Italian and ranch dressing is excellent.

Nice relaxing atmosphere.  When you see The ovens are old school, you know the quality level is going to be good.   I appreciate that they had a cheese pizza there and waiting so I could get two slices quick and go.  They rewarmed the pizza in their old style oven and wow it was good.   The bottom was crispy, cheese was tasty as was the sauce.  And the crust was crispy.  A taste right out of New York.  My kinda of pizza.  Loved it.   My new go to pizza place.
Excellent cheese pizza! Definitely in my top 10 in Vegas! Owners were nice too! Additional photos located on my profile page and videos on my YouTube page ( vivalasvegasx  )

recentReviews.text:
Frank‚Äôs pizza is a hidden gem in Las Vegas! This is our second time visiting the restaurant, and they amazed us yet again!!

The prices are affordable, and the service by the Frank family is lovely! They are so kind, and you can see their happiness while they are making the food! You must visit!! üòä

Came to have lunch ordered a spaghetti plate and a side of fries, when I paid the bill total was 39.?? But on my card statement they changed me 41.89. why is there an extra 2.00 taken? Guess you can't support the lil family owned places as they over charge you without your knowledge...
Shame on y'all for taking advantage of the community. I only gave 1 star because it makes you give 1..

I have a new favorite pizza. I've been reading reviews and been wanting to find out for myself.
Nicely decorated inside.  Kinda old school decor but very clean looking.
I ordered 2 cheese slices and got a drink too - it was 7.50 out the door, great price.
Got 2 slices right out from the oven, using the Portnoy scale, i definitely rate this 8.4 or better.  Very nice char on bottom, crispy crust.  They must be using higher quality mozzarella, no grease.  Just enough sauce, with nice flavors.  Great chew to the slices.

The food was a 10/10 espacially the wings amazing.

detailedReviews.author: Frank Canez
detailedReviews.text:
I have a new favorite pizza. I've been reading reviews and been wanting to find out for myself.
Nicely decorated inside.  Kinda old school decor but very clean looking.
I ordered 2 cheese slices and got a drink too - it was 7.50 out the door, great price.
Got 2 slices right out from the oven, using the Portnoy scale, i definitely rate this 8.4 or better.  Very nice char on bottom, crispy crust.  They must be using higher quality mozzarella, no grease.  Just enough sauce, with nice flavors.  Great chew to the slices.
The owner checked with me to make sure everything was good, it was great.
I definitely will be back, will explore more of their menu.

detailedReviews.author: David Stone
detailedReviews.text: Nice relaxing atmosphere.  When you see The ovens are old school, you know the quality level is going to be good.   I appreciate that they had a cheese pizza there and waiting so I could get two slices quick and go.  They rewarmed the pizza in their old style oven and wow it was good.   The bottom was crispy, cheese was tasty as was the sauce.  And the crust was crispy.  A taste right out of New York.  My kinda of pizza.  Loved it.   My new go to pizza place.

detailedReviews.author: Dlawar Melihan
detailedReviews.text: The food was a 10/10 espacially the wings amazing.

detailedReviews.author: Tim W.
detailedReviews.text: Was very good

detailedReviews.author: Jamie Keno
detailedReviews.text: Great food!!

detailedReviews.author: joseph jensen
detailedReviews.text: Amazing food and Victoria and her family are very attentive. Highly recommend this place for your pizza cravings

detailedReviews.author: M
detailedReviews.text: Excellent cheese pizza! Definitely in my top 10 in Vegas! Owners were nice too! Additional photos located on my profile page and videos on my YouTube page ( vivalasvegasx  )

detailedReviews.author: Philippe Elbaz
detailedReviews.text: Nice people's and good food. Simple and very easy to ordering

detailedReviews.author: John Cerbone
detailedReviews.text: Had good chicken parmigiana here.  They went out of their way to be accommodating.

detailedReviews.author: Rotem Banin
detailedReviews.text: Small place with great Italian pizza and pasta, and great service.

detailedReviews.author: bonnie matsumura
detailedReviews.text: We ordered take out from this quaint little pizza restaurant. The Franks specialty pizza on thin crust was delicious. Their crust is not over done and buttery. Their lasagna was very favorable, sauce is the bomb with a hint of garlic. My compliments to the chef. We also ordered an antipasto salad, not quite an Italian antipasto, but also very good. Their Italian and ranch dressing is excellent.

detailedReviews.author: Keith Tamura
detailedReviews.text: Amazing ingredients on the BEST NY-Style pizza crust!!! ...best in VEGAS... All at SUPER reasonable prices... this is a REAL mom & pop with Frank actually the owner-chef... wife and son as backup... this is something you don't find very often these days... a neighborhood pizza joint that just happens to be best-in-valley...

detailedReviews.author: WECAN FIXIT
detailedReviews.text: Best little Italian food spot. Great pizza. Great staff.

detailedReviews.author: David Davidson
detailedReviews.text: Honestly, I wish I had more to say. Great pizza, fantastic service & the prices were very reasonable. We got a large to share and it was easily enough pizza for 4 or more people.

detailedReviews.author: Madeline G.
detailedReviews.text: I loved the pizza and calamaris! Pizza thin and tasty, the calamari‚Äôs were so good and came with a garlic marinara sauce that was delicious! The restaurant itself was super clean. Highly recommend, you will not be disappointed.

detailedReviews.author: Georg E
detailedReviews.text: Best White Cheese Pizza in Town!

detailedReviews.author: Mary Barton
detailedReviews.text: What a great experience! I never even knew they were right down the street from me! Amazing customer service and the food was absolutely delicious!! This place has a beautiful atmosphere and old New York style music. The owners were so friendly. My goodness! This is where im going with family and friends from now on.

detailedReviews.author: Anthony Williams
detailedReviews.text: Got wings and Lasagna, both were EXCELLENT! Definitely doing again!

detailedReviews.author: Lori Gallios
detailedReviews.text: We have had pizza that was delicious! Tonight we dined in and had Manicotti and Pasta Primavera. Both meals were amazing. We look forward to the next time to try something different. Their menu has a variety of appetizers, salads, pizzas, pastas and more. The staff was friendly and attentive. This place will be on our go to list! Thank you for an awesome experience!!

detailedReviews.author: Juan Mart√≠n Vasco
detailedReviews.text: Small, family run business with phenomenal pizza. It is my go to when visiting Vegas. Frank and his family are wonderful.

detailedReviews.author: myrna alvarez
detailedReviews.text: Loved this place.  The food and the service were amazing!  Best Italian we have had in awhile!  Lucky to have stumbled upon this place!

detailedReviews.author: James Valdes the best gamer Hernandez
F BrYeN SaNgCo jR
detailedReviews.text: BEST PLACE for CALAMARI & FRIED ZUCCHINI‚Ä¶. !!! I LOVE THEM !!! ‚ù§Ô∏è

detailedReviews.author: Johnny Ooh
detailedReviews.text: This pic says it all.  Best pizza in vegas.  Hands down.

detailedReviews.author: Tim Juo
detailedReviews.text: I was sitting outside and ordered Frank‚Äôs special pizza and 10pc wings. I gotta say you will experience the layer to layer smell and taste, the best part of that is the tomato source will release the grease in every bite. That is how a good pizza should have.

detailedReviews.author: collin hughes
detailedReviews.text: Service was super fast pizza fresh and hot and delicious garlic knots are super good along with the mozzarella sticks

detailedReviews.author: Justin
detailedReviews.text: The cheese pizza here is a delightful New York style, boasting an exceptionally cheesy topping. The garlic knots, are lavishly seasoned, offering a hint of spice. As for the cannoli, it‚Äôs a delightful treat, combining a perfectly crispy shell with a lusciously sweet filling. All of which costed $30

detailedReviews.author: Jon Carpenter
detailedReviews.text: Still miss this place I had to move away and I can't find as good Italian as this

detailedReviews.author: Dawn Gault
detailedReviews.text: Stumbled on this place by accident. Ordered Eggplant Rollatini over penne to go, and really liked it! Some pizza places use so much salt it burns my tongue, not here. I've never heard of this dish, but the creamy ricotta over eggplant was like birthday cake frosting. Crazy? I have to watch the sodium and blood sugar so this was a  treat (like a birthday, yum!)

detailedReviews.author: Liliana Real
detailedReviews.text: Love, love, love the calzone here. I always order ahead and the service is fast, they great you as soon as you walk in.  Delicious!

detailedReviews.author: Nick ‚ÄúNick D Z‚Äù
detailedReviews.text: Chicken piccataüëçüèΩ meatballs and sauce üëçüèΩ pizzaüëçüèΩ

detailedReviews.author: Ms. Modest FreeBorn
detailedReviews.text: Hidden gem!!!!

detailedReviews.author: Kristia Marku
detailedReviews.text:
Have been here a couple times and they never disappoint! The pizza is amazing and unlike anything else in Vegas, it‚Äôs genuine New York pizza. The wings and pastas are also great, you have to give it a try!

p.s don‚Äôt forget about dessert the tira misu and cannolis are amazing

detailedReviews.author: KATHLEEN MALTESE
detailedReviews.text: The wings were NOT good. Dry and yuck.  I have had them before and they were great, this time not happy. Pizza and chicken were superb.  Will continue with Frank's but not the wings.

detailedReviews.author: Joshua Whitfield
detailedReviews.text: I order Franks almost once a week, their food is phenomenal. Go for the eggplant appetizer, the pink sauce is amazing. The lasagna and bruschetta pizzas are my favorite. The spaghetti carbonara is also great and I suspect the pasta is not store bought! Thank you Franks I will be a lifelong customer.

detailedReviews.author: Teresa Forcine
detailedReviews.text: 1st and last time ordering.   The crust was good but we did not enjoy the sauce at all.   Tons of huge raw onions.  We did not enjoy it.

detailedReviews.author: Annette Kalebic
detailedReviews.text: Pizza has a sour taste plus hardly much toppings for the price. More dough then ingredients. Chicken wings are suppose to be mild but there hot. Won't be back. Totally different taste then Chicago pizza

detailedReviews.author: Stacey May
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza in town!

detailedReviews.author: Anthony Guldin
detailedReviews.text: I don't order pizza for delivery very often, but I will buy from here again if I do. Really good pizza and fantastic service. Forget about those Mickey Mouse pizza joints! Enjoy some pizza with some great Italian flavor and NO cardboard crust!

detailedReviews.author: Kasey Hart
detailedReviews.text: This was my first time here was and definitely Worth it the food and the service was  awesome. Definitely recommend the spaghetti carbonara

detailedReviews.author: Angela Trejo
detailedReviews.text: Lovely little spot for lunch! All the food was absolutely delicious. The service was friendly and the place was clean. Would highly recommend to anyone looking for a nice afternoon meal.

detailedReviews.author: Kimberly Clark
detailedReviews.text: Been going here for about 2 years and it's ALWAYS amazing! Perfect pizza and crust... Great sauces and the best family atmosphere. They always treat me and my kids like they are so happy to see us....  Even though my kids are crazy ü§£. ü•∞

detailedReviews.author: Chance Munford
detailedReviews.text: Awsome food !

detailedReviews.author: Tom Lacklin
detailedReviews.text: The owners came and talked to us at our table!   Nice friendly people and family owned! It was a nice experience on my vacation from Detroit!

detailedReviews.author: Roberto Rodriguez
detailedReviews.text: Very delicious food and awesome staff.. thank you..ü§§üòä

detailedReviews.author: Christian Johnson
detailedReviews.text: This place makes excellent pizza and pasta, and I live nearby so this is my new favorite Italian spot. I had pasta delivered the other day - it was very tasty, warm and not overcooked, so they know how to prepare it. Nice people too.

detailedReviews.author: Austin Danner
detailedReviews.text: Hands down our favorite pizza in Las Vegas. Amazing pizza, staff and restaurant. Going to miss this place so bad when we leave this town.

detailedReviews.author: Kai
detailedReviews.text: Had the lasagna. Every bite only made me happier. I thought I was eating at my grandmothers. Truly a great, honest, and homestyle restaurant. I implore anyone who comes here to try it.

detailedReviews.author: Thomas Letourneau
detailedReviews.text:
I've been eating at Frank's for a while now, both dine in and pick up. They've never let me down.

Their pizza is good, but where this restaurant shines is their pasta dishes. The sausage is made in-house.  The sausage, peppers, and onions pasta will make you burst into song like a crazy person. The seafood pasta (Frank Sinatra) has olives in with the shrimp and clams. The olives bring the whole dish together. It's great.

This is truly a family owned restaurant. It's Mom, Dad, and Son every time I'm in there.  These people are proud of their food. You should try it.

detailedReviews.author: Daniel A. Valdez
detailedReviews.text: First things first, it's a very unique place. You can tell it's a family oriented place as soon as you walk in the door. It was a little hard to see their menu but they waited patiently while we decided on what to order and we were greeted with a smile. After ordering you can see how they do everything made to order, served fresh and piping hot! Their restroom is small but well maintained. It was a wonderful experience dining in. They aren't afraid to have a little conversation or interact with their customers. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND this place if you are looking to relax and have a great slice of pizza!

detailedReviews.author: Charles B
detailedReviews.text: Amazing!

detailedReviews.author: Patricia Raucci
detailedReviews.text: Always excellent food!!!

detailedReviews.author: Sophia Monge
detailedReviews.text: Love the pizza great food .

detailedReviews.author: Barry Corbett
detailedReviews.text: The quality of my pizza was pretty good but they didn‚Äôt put enough toppings. I had the Frank‚Äôs special.

detailedReviews.author: Nick C
detailedReviews.text: Great place for authentic N.Y Italian food. Highly recommended.

detailedReviews.author: BayAerialDrone 2017
detailedReviews.text: Literally the best little lunch cafe in Vegas for baked ziti!! GREAT customer service! Large portions and super fresh! We will definitely go back again and again!

detailedReviews.author: trunks787
detailedReviews.text:
We had a table of 6 and got to try 3 apps and I had garlic knots, garlic bread, mozzarella sticks and lasagna . The lasagna was the perfect size for my stomach to have soda and not be uncomfortable after. The cheese and meat were super fresh and the noodle was cooked perfectly. I can't complaint about anything I had here.
My entire table was satisfied.

detailedReviews.author: Kyle Markman
detailedReviews.text: Frank‚Äôs has been my go-to and favorite pizza place for years now. Delivery is quick. Pizza is always hot and delicious. Highly recommend.

detailedReviews.author: CrimsonShroud1
detailedReviews.text: Best garlic knots on the west coast, hands down

detailedReviews.author: Kim Gutierrez
detailedReviews.text: Nice people work here. Thank you.

detailedReviews.author: Taco Mix
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza I have ever eaten in my life !

detailedReviews.author: Will Smith
detailedReviews.text: This place is unreal. It's exactly what you want. It's perfect.

detailedReviews.author: Wes west
detailedReviews.text: Straight firre

detailedReviews.author: Christi Cook
detailedReviews.text: It was our last visit as we were unpleasantly surprised. Over salted, over seasoned dry Philly cheesesteak, inedible chewy hard tooth breaking chicken fingers, over salted fries and runny ranch with no flavor. What happened? I wrote a five star a year ago. They offered to replace the meal but attempting to eat this one made us ill. Now I have to fight with Uber to get a refund.

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers are genuinely thrilled with their experience. With an average 4.8/5 rating across 100 recent reviews, your restaurant consistently exceeds expectations.

strengthsPerceived: Customers rave about the crispy crust and high-quality mozzarella used in Frank's pizza, which they describe as having a great chew and no grease. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
The Frank family provides lovely and attentive service, creating a welcoming atmosphere that makes customers feel at home. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
Frank's pizza offers super reasonable prices for delicious, authentic NY-style pizza, making it a favorite neighborhood spot. - Boostly marketing services can amplify this
improvementOpportunities: Overcharging and billing discrepancies - review management can address this concern
Inconsistent food quality (e.g., dry wings, over salted meals) - review management can address this concern
Insufficient toppings and ingredient issues - social media marketing can improve this area

recommendations.description: Encourage satisfied customers to leave reviews
